targetScopes.title: Target Scopes
targetScopes.description: If specified, this package will highlight code cells with the specified languages scopes. By default (empty `array`), it will highlight _every_ code cell even without language scope. E.g.: if you _only_ want to highlight Julia code cells, you can set this config to `["source.embedded.julia"]`. Requires restarting Atom to take an effect.

markdownScopes.title: Markdown Scopes
markdownScopes.description: Specifies grammar scopes that this package will consider as markdown files and try to highlight code cells.
